channel.title: Retros on Conor Lamb's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Retros on Conor Lamb's Blog

item.title: July 2024: Conor's Monthly Retrospective
item.description: Goals Met: ~65% Song Of The Month (listen while reading!): Wish I Was - Kim Deel - Lofi Indie How did I do with last month’s goals? Work None this month! Music Plan for Chlorine Release/Video Result: C+ I have a plan and a format for making a few videos with Josh. I have remixed the song a few more times but I like where it is now. I don’t have an exact plan for the release itself, I mean I do for releasing the reels around the song, but not a plan to get some other release buzz.

item.title: June 2024: Conor's Monthly Retrospective
